proposal: #598 - Proposing Curators for the DeFi Infrastructure & Tooling Bounty
rationale: Velocity Labs proposed a curator set for the DeFi Infrastructure and Tooling Bounty including N. Arevalo, A. Viera, B. Chen, Lucas Vogelsang, Leemo, J. Gregus, and Giotto.
details: The list of curators is very balanced, so it really seems that DeFi Infractructure & Tooling Bounty is in a good hands.

rationale: Polkadot Blockchain Academy will happen from May 20 to June 20, 2024 at the National University of Singapore.
details: Easy AYE here, this is kind of a proposal that benefits the Polkadot ecosystem in the long run. Having 100+ graduates from the academy is truly awesome.

rationale: RegionX is a project that helps reduce costs for projects on the Polkadot network. The project also has a secondary marketplace where users can trade Coretime.
details: Projects like RegionX will build on the foundation that the new model offers to enable greater flexibility in Coretime procurement.

rationale: StellaSwap wants to attract more people to use Polkadot for DeFi by using 1M DOT from Treasury as incentives.
details: Attracting liquidity is beneficial for the end users – traders. Similarly to HydraDX proposal, we also support this referendum.

proposal: #576 - Continuation of work through Messari Protocol Services
rationale: Messari wants to continue working with Polkadot to provide research.
details: Due to high engagement (350k subscribers), reducing budget by 30%, this proposal seems reasonable. We are voting AYE.

rationale: Attract liquidity and attention to the Polkadot ecosystem by granting the HydraDX Treasury 1,000,000 DOT.
details: Incentivizing liquidity providers is one of the main tactics on how to get the attention of DeFi users from outside of Polkadot eco. AYE.

rationale: 1,000,000 DOT as a non-custodial provision of liquidity into the HydraDX Omnipool.
details: We are in favor of this proposal, as it benefits users the most. And also those funds will remain under the control of the Polkadot Protocol and OpenGov.

proposal: #539 - Polkadot Asia Developer Community Expansion for 1 Year Operation
rationale: Providing opportunities and assistance for specific objectives in establishing the Polkadot ecosystem in Asia.
details: Using marketing bounty, events bounty or some Asian bounty with trusted curators would make more sense.

proposal: #525 - Polkadot marketing proposal in Chinese speaking areas
rationale: This proposal aims to boost the brand recognition of Polkadot to a broader group of audience in APAC region.
details: We voted NAY, because applying via Marketing bounty makes better sense. Or in some Asian bounty with trusted curators.

proposal: #517 - Polkadot Desktop Wallet Tutorial by Altcoin Daily
rationale: Altcoin Daily aims to create a tutorial of Talisman wallet for 5,986 DOT.
details: After watching those low-quality videos produced for the pricetag of 21,219 DOT as a result of referendum #255, we must say NAY to this proposal.

rationale: This proposal is a sponsorship for Conor Daly to race in 3 professional series, including Indianapolis 500, NASCAR Truck Series, and Nitro Rallycross.
details: This proposal presents a unique opportunity to elevate Polkadot's visibility on a global stage through high-profile racing events.

proposal: #343 - Set BEEFY genesis (thus starting BEEFY consensus on Kusama)
rationale: This sets BEEFY genesis to the next block after it executes, thus enabling BEEFY consensus on Kusama.
details: Enabling BEEFY consensus on Kusama sets the stage for the Kusama<>Ethereum Snowfork bridge. Very beneficial for Kusama and later for Polkadot. AYE.

rationale: By that referendum approved, HydraDX will add CRU token from Crust to the Omnipool.
details: Having CRU from Crust in the Omnipool will boost the usage of the token and add the total TVL of the Omnipool.
